# Mediaad

## Example

### Basic

```html
<amp-ad
  width="300"
  height="200"
  type="mediaad"
  data-publisher="mediaad-publisher-domain.com"
  data-medtag="mediaad-XXXX"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration semantics, please contact the ad network or refer to their documentation.

Supported parameters:

-   `data-publisher`
-   `data-medtag`
